column4: I'm running Ubuntu 10.10 x86, and have just downloaded a package from debian.org. How do I download all of its dependencies automatically?
I think GDebi will take care of that for you
assuming, of course, that the deps are available in the ubuntu repos
I get an error when I double click on it: "Dependency is not satisfiable: libgcrypt 11 (>= 1.4.6)"
